list.bullet: Share data using a standarized file format (e.g. RSS, CML), better yet, via a standard web services protocol: REST, XML-RPC, SOAP.
*REST* is the simplest way to share. We've been doing it since the CGI spec appeared.
*XML-RPC* is simple, but data with complex structure might not be easy to represent.
*SOAP* is more complex, but it gives you more flexibility (XML Schemas, RPC and Document Literal, WSDL, Service redirection, etc.)
Plan on synchronous and asynchronous access to improve performance.
